p: In the evaluation of flavonoids content, statistical difference ( p < 0.05) was found among every month of the year between M. villosa and P. amboinicus, as shown in Figure 2. It was also observed that P. amboinicus presented the highest values of these metabolites during the whole year, when compared to the other studied species. The best month for M. villosa harvest was April (28.72 mg querc/g of crude extract) and for P. amboinicus, December (49.82 mg querc/g of crude extract).
